entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening and ending before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023
